2025-04-21.title: Staffs VS Birmingham 18:00
2025-04-21.description: A 6v6 test match between Staffs and Birmingham. This will serve as a test of the Cheep Cheep application and YouTube streaming. Members of the relevant teams can sign up to compete in this match using the button in the team's announcement channel. This match will be streamed from both team's perspectives on the University Mario Kart League's YouTube channel. You can visit it here: https://www.youtube.com/@universitymariokartleague
